cast.name: 格特鲁德·伯克利 Gertrude Berkeley
George W. Middleton George W. Middleton
瓦勒斯卡·萨拉特 Valeska Suratt

writer.name: 赫伯特·布雷农 Herbert Brenon

director.name: 赫伯特·布雷农 Herbert Brenon

introduction: As described in a film magazine, La Valencia (Suratt), a stage beauty, has ensnared a young man who steals in order to shower her with the luxuries that she demands. He is caught and, after serving a 5-year term, emerges from prison a gray haired man. La Valencia comes across him again, and her passion revives. She seeks to ensnare him again, but now he is married and his old life has no charms for him. Desperate, she then threatens to reveal his past to his wife, which leads to a terrific climax.
